Hi! Did you know that you can rent and purchase modular buildings through TIPS USA (The Interlocal Purchasing System), including classrooms and offices?
Your organization is already a member of TIPS USA, so bidding out a modular building project can be a thing of the past for you! TIPS USA is a national cooperative that has already done the bidding legwork.
How can you learn more about using your TIPS USA membership to get building space fast?
﻿ ﻿> Reply to this email ﻿ ﻿> Request A Quote (https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request) ﻿ ﻿> Call 877-966-7839 to speak with your local expert
BOXX Modular is a multi-contract TIPS USA awarded vendor for both Permanent Modular Buildings (contract #200902) and Portable Modular Buildings (contract #21020201 & 21020202).
https://www.tips-usa.com/vendorProfile.cfm?RecordID=51E09B5D3C458F2F374955901EB339B9
What sort of modular buildings does BOXX Modular offer?
﻿ ﻿> Modular Classroom Buildings (https://www.boxxmodular.com/classrooms/) ﻿ ﻿> Modular Office Buildings (https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/) ﻿ ﻿> Custom Modular Buildings (https://www.boxxmodular.com/specialty/)
About TIPS USA...(https://www.tips-usa.com/)
﻿ ﻿> TIPS USA contracts are awarded by Region 9 ESC's board members, a public agency in Texas commissioned by the Texas state legislature and governed by seven board members which are elected by local school board members.
﻿ ﻿> Vendors, including BOXX Modular, are vetted through a strict competitive procurement process.
﻿ ﻿> The bidding statute is Chapter 44031 of the Texas Education Code.
We are here to help you get the space you need as quickly and easily as possible!
